title: Bug 9274Export dialog does not populate list if element is preselected
OB: Bug 9274Export dialog does not populate list if element is preselected
SR: If the current selection for export is a file that is in the root of a projectselecting that project the first time in the export dialog won't do anything.If you select a second time it will.STEPS1) Create a Project Foo2) Create a file bar.txt in Foo3) Select bar.txt4) Choose export5) Select Foo in the dialogno contents6) CLick off and click againcontents
